Review.Titre: I’d give negative stars if that was…

I finally received an email stating that part of my order was ready to be delivered ( I guess my kids might be able to use the other items if Apple is still in business after another decade or so)..  Anyway, they provided a link where I was told to go to “confirm my shipping address”.  I went there and was asked for my credit card information to complete a $1375 purchase. I already paid for my items  As it turned out, the website helpfully ore-selected further items I might like to purchase for $1375. After contacting the company they sent a video showing how I could unselect the pre-selected items. Unfortunately, the website was slightly different that the one in the video and I ended up getting charged $165 for 7 or 8 of the same charging cable in different colors and a small charging block. Helpful because what animal wants to use a white charging cord when they’re wearing blue jeans?  I had to call my credit card company to dispute the charge. There’s probably plenty of time as I suspect I have to verify my address for this purchase in another 3-4 years. This company is a scam and they will steal all your money if they could.

Review.Titre: The product only looks and feels great
Review.Contenu: The product looks and feels great, however, the functionality is limited. 1) extreme - have not tried/needed to jumpstart, so cannot say on that. I have used for wireless charging, will charge my iPhone and Samsung to 89% overnight and never get to 100%charge. When received it was 50% changed (great), plugged in (Lux charging cable) and placed a phone on to wirelessly charge, the LEDs blinked red when the phone was placed on it (asked support about this and no answers). Charged extreme until all LEDs were lit, same flashing red lights when I use it and will not charge a phone past 89%. 2) Life - will not stay on more than 30 minutes when charging. Tried to use it to finish charging a phone (the last 11% from extreme) and will only get to 90% and will stop and turn off. This even happens when it is plugged in. And it gets very hot. 3) Air - again will not fully charge a phone when used attached to either extreme or life. However, if I plug it in with any USB C cable, it will charge a phone to 100%. It seems to perform no better than any other product of this type.

Review.Titre: As a former customer of MagFast
Review.Contenu: As a former customer of MagFast, who waited years for a product and if I had not cancelled, would likely still not have it, I can say that, contrary to what their Customer Service will tell you, MagFast is already obsolete if you have a modern iPhone.  Apple introduced MagSafe magnetic charging devices a few years ago and soon Qi2 will be available for all modern phones.  MagSafe charges iPhones at twice the speed of standard Qi chargers, of which the MagFast product is an example.  Apple MagSafe also magnetically attaches to your phone so no need to worry about placement. I had wanted to order their watch charger they promised 3 years ago which is still awaiting production.  But you can get a similar products now from other companies and that is what I have done.Companies like ESR, Mophie are shipping products today that are compatible with modern phones and MagFast is still working on getting obsolete technology to their initial customers.  Do not believe them when they say their products are not obsolete.  Because a little research will show you otherwise.  Just go to esrgear.com or zagg.com on and you’ll find products that you can use today.  Mophie has a standup MagSafe battery pack that is just awesome.  Sure MagFast makes a nice cable, but honestly, so do a dozen other companies.  I’m sure their luggage is nice but why have a suitcase with a giant battery attached that you have to take off before checking it in for a flight?  Does MagFast know batteries can’t be in,(or on), checked luggage?  And then you have to carry the giant battery on the plane with you?  I know they’re trying and I respect that, but unless they can produce MagSafe chargers an ship them in a timely manner, I can no longer consider myself a customer.  My original order was placed on November 27, 2019.

As for Extreme I haven't had to jump start any cars yet, but can say having it plugged into a tablet that is being used as a register for 8 hours straight uses up about 70% of Extremes battery life, so I will say extreme can last a long time will being used, but i also noticed after fully charging extreme it looses about 10% battery life every 2-3 weeks of not being used .. for comparisons, my mophie power bank lost about 10-20% battery life on standby in about 8 months of sitting idle in a backpack..So my overall review at this time, is the product falls extremely short for what is was supposed to be.. high end costs, middle end quality...

I will update the stars rating when and if I receive the paper check they promised.UPDATE: I received my refund check, so I am giving them 2 stars because it seems they only responded to me after I posted my review here. Review.Titre: Nice looking, but don't be fooled.  Extremely slow and unreliable!
Review.Contenu: Nice looking, but I'll keep to the existing basics.  I purchased the EXTREME package of products a few years ago and even invested in the company, but the product doesn't live up to the hype.  LIFE, the portable charger looks great, but in reality it doesn't charge well.  Took it on vacation in England thinking it would be great as a replacement for our other portable chargers and instead after a week of using it, we went back to our old chargers.  It charges extremely SLOW, the device connector didn't work and just unreliable to be honest.  We also took AIR with us.  It works, but again, very, very slow.  If you're looking for any kind of speed in charging, these products are not for you.  Very disappointed.  The good 'ole Apple plugs are still the best unfortunately in the case of AIR.  Where AIR may be of use is at home by your computer while you're working since it can hold your phone up and charge while you work.  But other than that, these products are not fast, don't work well and unfortunately do not compare with existing products in the marketplace.  Maybe the cables are great, but don't have any.  LIFE and AIR basically suck for the money and use.

The last 4 LEDs supplied about 2% of a charge. EXTREMEly Disappointed. I have repeated this test. It appears the best use is to have the device plugged in, acting as a multi-qi charger. I have not tested the jumpers.Similary, the LIFEless unit charges my phone only once, and only by cable. The Qi does not work. Though it is light to carry, the angle of the cable is not convenient for charging while in a pocket. The device has been returned to its box with no expectation of use.

Review.Titre: Serious doubts about this being legit
Review.Contenu: On March 20, 2019 I got suckered into watching the MagFast video online so I could get a free wall charger. Of course, the crazy low prices they were offering for adding more products to the order were too good to pass up. I ended up paying over $60 for additional products. Unfortunately, I did my research after the fact. I didn’t realize they had been working on this project already for several years. After about 6 months of receiving email updates each week, i realized this product is never going to come to market. They are so many years into the project and they change the logo, change the design, discover a flaw with this or that ... there is no way that they would even have money to start production at this point. The money from preorders is probably long gone. I don’t know if this is a scam, or if this guy just is terrible at running a business. Either way - don’t let the discounted presale lure you in. Wait until it comes to market. I really don’t think that day will come. It’s no closer now than it was 15 months ago.

Review.Titre: Magfast has a great story but geez !!
Review.Contenu: Magfast has a great story and I loved the presentation, innovation, and the pro kit concept.  I placed my pre-order two years ago and after a year of waiting kind of shrugged and expected to wait a couple of more months since Covid was over.  Finally a batch number was assigned to me and I got excited again.  Then came a stock offering with Magfast not delivering a single product.  Next they split up the pre-orders promising a Hello kit.  This kit excluded the Road and Wall units.  The Wall units were the enticements to pre-order the pro kits.  Next came another delay in shipment followed by a second stock offering.  Again no products delivered to date.  Now a third change to the delivery schedule.  I am looking at almost two and one-half years now with no real expectation that Magfast will hold true to that.  Technology is usually outdated when waiting this long for your pre-ordered products.  The last batch shown is October 2023 for delivery.  When will the remaining components of the pro kit be sent?  Who knows?  I know that wall unit plugs included in the pro kit we expected first will probably not be shipped until 2024 or 2025.With Magfast now developing a new cable that they want folks to pre-order.  Will this take 3 years to deliver on?  Not sure I will order until my first of two shipments arrive.  It’s hard to watch their long video updates when Magfast has not delivered anything but investor kits.

Review.Titre: Two stars is generous, but I like planting trees
Review.Contenu: Two stars for: a). planting trees (I think?! How do we know?) and b). for really positive, engaging video content. MAGFAST's marketing game is *boss*. Minus 3 stars for: a) breathlessly optimistic but unfulfilled promises about how amazing technology takes time, it's crowd-funding, etc. Today is actually the 17-month - to the day - since my pre-order. That's longer than any other crowd-funded thing I've ever paid for by about 50%. I'm hoping the expression "Good things come to those who wait", but perhaps Seymour can forgive me for having trouble believing it applies to MAGFAST products at this point.b) many words about how supply chain problems are delaying delivery etc. Yes, that's understood but the most recent response from customer service in August 2021 was "It will take some months to ship all the pre-orders". Indeed. 5 so far. So how much is "some" at this point, in the hindsight of January 2022?c) endless invitations to invest. You have to admire the audaciousness of a company that continues to explain why they're having significant difficulties delivering products to continue to ask you to invest in them.Finally, who are all the 4,000+ people on here positively reviewing the product? When did they receive their orders? What's the SECRET to getting your order fulfilled? Please do tell.

Review.Titre: This is a review of the presentation…
Review.Contenu: This is a review of the presentation and not the products.  By way of background, I am very tech savvy.  I have a degree in applied math, was a computer programmer for the first 5 or 6 years out college, and my current business/hobby is all high end technology and everything after the first 5 years was sales - and marketing.That said, I was totally lost watching the video.  One of the first things I learned in sales is that one should sell "benefits/solutions", and not "products/features".  What I heard was something to the equivalent of "you can easily connect this 'box' to that 'box', and this 'box' has 3 USB connections, and this 'box' has these two kinds of connectors and blah, blah, blah" but never anything like "Here are some real world examples of how you can use these pieces of advanced technology can be integrated to make charging easier, more consistent, faster and with fewer wires"  And then give some examples.  Your presentation may have gotten there eventually, but I quit watching after 30 minutes as I had no clue how any of your 'boxes' would help address MY specific situations.  We have 3 iPads in different rooms in the house; 3 MacBooks, 2 iPhones and two Apple watches, and two AppleTVs. And when we travel, we have to carry along 2 phone chargers, 2 watch chargers and 2 computer chargers. Surely, out of all of those 'boxes' you could have given some examples so that I could have figured out that I need 'Box 1' Box 3' and 'Box 4" connected in 'this' way.  But I have no idea.  NONE.I have seen lots of ads for a combo watch/phone/ear bud chargers.  Those are simple to understand.  But I was hoping your products would take that concept to the next step.  But instead I wasted 30 minutes of my life since I gained no useful knowledge such that I could make an informed decision.I

Review.Titre: Product seems great, marketing is compelling, companies operations are unproven, buyer beware! (will update when product is in hand)
Review.Contenu: I ordered about a year ago, buying the full product line, which was ~$300. Still haven't received anything, and I have not received any personalized update on a delivery window. While I don't believe this is a scam (Update on 8/31/20: I'm starting to feel this is a scam that I fell for), and I do trust the product will be excellent (if expensive) (Update: I'm starting to feel this product doesn't exist or will never ship), I am disappointed that Magfast, the company, puts more effort into marketing communication towards prospects, than operational communication to update paying customers on actually delivery expectations.I would encourage others to hold off on ordering until the company has proven themselves operationally. Their marketing is (update: was) compelling, their R&D is (update: sounded) intriguing, but their operational ability is still unproven. If they cannot deliver from the funds they have received already, they don't deserve the responsibility of more funds from others. (I'm happy to update this when I receive the product)(Update: I'm pretty shocked that a company would care so little about updating paying customers on actually deliver status. I will certainly never trust "crowdfunded" product development again, and, even if they happen to deliver a stellar product, will never purchase Magfast again. They have lost my trust!Lingering question: how many chargers have the early investors had to purchase while they wait for the "charger to end all chargers?" I'd guess it counterbalances all the trees Magfast supposedly planted.I remind you of two of Confucius's great sayings: "The charger you have works better than the one you don't have!" and "the charger that exists is superior to the one that doesn't exist.)

Review.Titre: At the heart of this review: over-engineered and ugly
Review.Contenu: I clicked on the link after watching the short promo video that came up on my Facebook. I registered because you seemed home grown and genuine. And because I believe that a good charger can make a huge difference to quality of life.  I think I believe in your ideals.  I also was excited when you said “just by registering we’ll send you this amazing charger”. I listened to at least an hour of the presentation. I will not be buying any of your products, despite the passion you obviously have for it and the work you’ve put in. Here are the issues: Function:I charge my devices at night.  Only at night. The batteries these days are good enough that they last the day.  I would t buy a product that I had to charge through the day.   I don’t need power banks.I don’t need kitchen chargers. I don’t even need office chargers.  My devices last as long as they need to. So the charger I need has to sit on an easily reachable side table in my bedroom. Ideally easily visible to me.  Ideally charging my Apple Watch at the same time.  Ideally Qi. Ideally super fast. Ideally beautiful. Your Air will do that for the phone. But I’m not mounting it on the Wall. And I’m not charging a Life every day to plug into the back of it.  So it needs a charging cable.  And I have a competitors version that is a quarter the cost and more value.  And yours doesn’t charge the watch.  Your Time is cute. But over engineered. I think you’ve mostly over engineered actually, unfortunately. Solving problems that arent real problems… just engineering problems.  The extreme is the pinnacle of this: I don’t need a car booster.  In this day and age:.  Who buys a 1300$ iPhone, hundreds of dollars of charging equipment, but has a car from the 80s that doesn’t automatically  turn off headlights? Boosting car engines is not in this demographic. Design: I’m sorry.  The blocks are ugly.  They just are.  They’re too big. Huge really. They add to visual clutter, and while the lack of cords is nice, the bulk of them on surfaces and mounted on the wall is unappealing. The extreme is a brick. It’s funny that you used it as a image of all the other chargers… I have zero interest of having that in my house. Some elements of the design are really nice.  The small cords, for example, with the magnets in the tips.  The idea of the air folding up is nice. Click bait: Don’t promise a free charger and then click bait for a multi hour presentation without following through.  Bad business.  Free is free.  Free is not : spend 350 and we’ll throw this thing in for “free”.
Too Expensive

Marketing in the 21st century is unlike anything ever witnessed in history. Every day, I’m amazed at the various presentations - each more technologically mind boggling than its predecessor’s. But this kind of high tech marketing has taken on a feeling of fantasy rather than of reality. Not unlike a pleasant dream that feels so real upon awakening but fades as the morning progresses. I signed up for the lengthy video presentation and watched it recently and I was left with that feeling of surrealism. I have not pre-ordered and it’s not my intention to dissuade anyone from doing so. I’m merely giving my opinion of what I got out of the video presentation. Some of what I derived gives me concern but I have no intention of making accusations of the legitimacy of the product or of the company’s principals. But the fact that there is still no product after so much time, is a red flag for me. I have read the company replies to the negative reviews and parts of them appear copied and pasted, ie: “crowdfunding a large project has bumps in the road; “quality products take time”; “we’re an honest company”, et al, I imagine to save time. They give very well-crafted replies to complaints but no real answers or solutions. That’s another concern. Despite the company’s explanation, the video presentation was excessively long in my opinion. I wasn’t watching to get a free gift. I was intrigued about the product. Using the owner’s daughter as a cute lure is effective but it felt a bit manipulative to me. But then, I’ve never cared for that kind of approach.Bottom line for me is this: Innovative products have been manufactured for generations long before “crowd funding” existed. In fact, all of these investment generators like “crowd funding” and “Go Fund Me” are rife with scammers, snake oil salesmen, and thieves, in addition to legitimate entrepreneurs and inventors. Product development somehow existed just fine before these fund raising platforms were around and my own experience with them has been largely negative. I can certainly see the benefit to a small business but the “investor” must be careful. Is Magfast a risky investment? I don’t know, but I have concerns. If Magfast was available right now, I would probably buy one. I might even “pre-order” if there were final products being prepped for delivery at this time. But with only a vague, nebulous timeline, I will make do with the battery chargers that are already on the market. Let’s be honest: there are countless battery packs and chargers available right now - including the car jumping feature (I have one that even has a solar power option!) I’m sorry but the Magfast is not a new invention. Granted, it’s got some mighty nifty innovations and conveniences that I like, but it’s still a battery and charger. And the added bells and whistles, while nice, are not so mind blowing (for me), that I’m willing to “invest” several hundred dollars in advance to “hopefully” get one at some undetermined futuristic date. But yes, if it was available today, I would probably buy one. I like the concept. With respect, there are simply too many unknowns here for a product that already exists. And no amount of polished marketing, nor enthusiastic pitches by the inventor (and his teenage daughter), will convince me otherwise. I wave the flag of entrepreneurialism but this flag looks a bit too red at the moment anyway, for my comfort level. I hope I’m wrong.Thank you.Post hoc: I received a personal reply from the company shortly after I published my review. I appreciated the honesty and transparency in his words. I have slightly edited my review to insure my tone was not accusatory of or even implying dishonesty. I don’t know the man and some of the one star reviews I have read, frankly, were below the belt. That’s uncalled for. He offered no new information (and said as much) but nor did he offer excuses or attach blame to his vendors. He gave me a stand-up reply which I value. Honesty is always the best policy. In business and in life. I gave an additional star in my review as a result. It appears that this company is doing their best to get Magfast manufactured and into consumer’s hands. But it could be awhile. If folks don’t mind waiting, it looks like it will be a quality product.

Review.Titre: I ordered the three cords and receive three cords with adaptors
Review.Contenu: I ordered the three cords and received them without waiting like some other reviews state.  The charging cords were packaged beautifully and securely. I am giving it 3 stars...one for each positive quality...I like the pliable cord, the length AND the adaptor.  But, maybe I didn't understand the ads...I thought it was going to charge the iPhone/Pad faster.  It's no faster the the iPhone/Pad charger I currently use.   Needless to say I am was disappointed when I sampled it before wrapping for Christmas gifts, but I'll keep the product.  We're always searching for cords.

On the plus side, the products shipped are of very high quality. On the negative side, the great majority of products in this order were not sent at time of order and are listed as "preorder". The order page does indicate the pre-order nature. I'm fine with that but would have liked some estimated availability / Ship date.

After viewing the presentation, I think that the Magfast system is very interesting. What is the turn off is the premium price point on an unknown system. I don't know about you, but I'm leary about putting 300 dollars down on something that has "handmade" components in the presentation.

The video was professional and well made. It was devoid of working units… why not plug it all in and show us how it works? Just seems fishy too me. Your “free gift” system needs some work… after hours, I still couldn’t finalize an order. Spinning wheel…

Do these products look amazing? Sure. Am I tired of waiting 10 months and I still don't have a firm shipping date? You bet. Do I want to buy shares in this company? Hard no. Seymour and Kate seem like sincere people representing a company trying their best to ship a product during a pandemic. I get it. That's hard. I just wish they would invest less effort in breathlessly enthusiastic videos and more in actually shipping the product. If they would honestly have told me up front "it will be a year between your order and your product", I would not have purchased this.

Review.Titre: Has anyone received the items they ordered? Is there a product out there to review yet?
Review.Contenu: I was very impressed with the Magfast presentation and enthusiastic to order a Pro Kit, but I decided to do a little research first, and I'm reading nothing but positive reviews on this company. The problem is this: in every enthusiastically positive review I read, the reviewer hasn't received the product! They've been doing these presentations for nearly 3 years now. It is the same presentation now as it was 3 years ago, and as far as I can tell, they haven't shipped a single product. I'll keep an eye on this, but by this point, I'm not optimistic.

Review.Titre: Why am I rating a sales presentation?
Review.Contenu: At this point all I am rating is a sales presentation. As promised it was very "appleish". Unfortunately that is long on overly broad capabilities and form while being a bit short on details and capabilities. But hey, lots of people buy pretty and a promise.

Review.Titre: Make a shorter video without someone searching for words and the same forced excitement tone of voice
Review.Contenu: The informational video was incredibly dull and long winded. The products, while appear to be an improvement on current power bank options, still seem likely to cause clutter around the outlets where they become charged. Love the idea of the extreme though. Incredibly inventive. My advice would be to shorten the the video to a max of 15 minutes and possibly offer a different or customizable payment plan for the pro kit. As a college aged person i am interested in your products but can’t afford to drop that much money at once or on a 6 month plan. $15-20 s as month would be nice to see.

Review.Titre: JESUS CHRISTMAS! GREAT BUT YOU WAIT AND WAIT
Review.Contenu: I ordered the whole package almost a year ago and still do not have my order.  The reason for the THREE STARS?  BECAUSE I'M STILL HOPING I GET THEM!  I've emailed, they always respond, so that's good.. right?

friend of a friend said the magfast will having a tie in with the video game "star citizen" and may be packed in limited edition boxed retail copy of star citizen for pc.  so may be worth the wait?  guess it's up to you decide?

Review.Titre: I wished my question would have been…
Review.Contenu: I wished my question would have been answered in chat, and I wished I would have known before spending $500 that I wouldn’t receive anything until after the end of the year.

I particularly appreciate the tree planting to offset the carbon footprint of the product. I also like the green colour option, and the adjustable mounting points.  I don't like that the pro kit comes with so many products that apparently overlap in purpose. Promotional video was overly long and repetitive, and felt throughout like trying very hard to emulate an Apple keynote without the actual sizzle. But the product looks quite nicely crafted. I will try the free charger, and if it works as claimed I'd consider ordering additional ones; however, I'd want to use the product personally before I'd endorse it.

Review.Titre: Initial part of the presentation was…
Review.Contenu: Initial part of the presentation was engaging and technically intriguing.  Unfortunately, the longer the presentation lasted, it becomes repetitive, especially the part about planting trees.  I believe the success of Apple marketing, which Seymour modeled his presentation, was simplicity and allowing the product to generate the buzz.  The need to raise initial funding is understandable, but after 30 min., the message was beginning to echo late night Ginsu knife offer ... but wait there's more. I think the product is great and has potential to distinguish itself in this crowded, challenging market.  Hope this comment was helpful.

This sounds absolutely wonderful so I ordered on Sept 2, 2020.  Since getting my receipt I have not heard a word from them.  There were supposed to be weekly updates.  A general idea of when they will be sent would be nice.  At this point I'm wondering if this is a very good scam to get our money.  I sure hope not because I really like the looks of this.Thank you so much for your quick response.  I did know that there would be a delay in receiving it, and am so happy that you were able to fix this for me!  It was the lack of communication that bothered me.  So thank you again for the response, I did go to the site, and am so happy to be receiving the emails!!

Well I'm not sure how real it is yet, but they seem to be shipping the product as of now, so as I promised I'm changing my rating, I'm going to 3 stars until the time I can actually order and get a product.

Review.Titre: Can not give 5 stars because it's not…
Review.Contenu: Can not give 5 stars because it's not been delivered. Giving 3 because it seems like a great way to charge on thon the go. Love they are planting trees for every order.

Review.Titre: Appears to be a huge improvement to the…
Review.Contenu: Appears to be a huge improvement to the electronic age we currently find ourselves!  Hopefully their product will meet their video presentation and put smiles on many faces!!!
They've been good with updates, tho I still haven't received any of my products.  No worries!   I know they will come through!

Interesting charging idea, design looks very nice. But so called free charger comes with $10 shipping charge and no plugs. Need to pay at least $20 more to buy something to make the charger actually useful.

Presention was impressive but slightly misleading. Founder needs to be more transparent that the prokit will not ship once you pay for the product. Exactly/approx when will the customer receive the product

So I want to review because I believe it's important to you.  I love the system and idea you are trying to get across.  I would be all in....except for the fact you are NOT kid friendly. I would totally buy 2 pro kits as that is what I would utilize....however... The system does NOT take into account the way kids behave. The way the blocks are charged....1. I would constantly be looking fornwhonhas what block...2. Then when I find it , it will very likely be totally dead.. because3. Kids are not inclined enough to take it back down...and charge it when it needs chargingSo... I would be more inclined to proceed if there was a fully wired wall plug that would plug in the block and charge it where ever it was. Yes, it seems more cumbersome, but, when you have a family with 4 kids... This system will constantly be seeing challenges because it's being misplaced, not charged... Or god knows what.

Review.Titre: I just pre-ordered so I'm excited to…
Review.Contenu: I just pre-ordered so I'm excited to receive.  Its definitely rough sharing charges, waiting for a cord. This will absolutely 💯 end that and charge quickly.Can't wait to use.

Review.Titre: Great concept but just a little too…
Review.Contenu: Great concept but just a little too overpriced. $300 for charging is too high. When you get it down to $199, let me know. How can the average family invest $300 in charging? Great concept, though.

Review.Titre: This is my honest and true review
Review.Contenu: This is my honest and true review, you decide from there. So I watched your presentation for over 1/2 an hour. Giving me the whole play by play on how the products beats the competition. You tell me that I get a free gift if I watch this video. Regardless of the reason I watched the video, you should stick true to your word. Does that happen? No!Now I have to write a review about a product that I haven’t even had the opportunity to use yet. Then a review Title. Then my email address, then at the very end “Sign up.” Sign up for what? I don’t want to sign up for anything. I want to place the order for my gift and be done with it. Like all the others, asking for more than you said. Now I’m trying to Title my review and it’s not letting me. SO FRUSTRATING!!!!!

Review.Titre: Interesting...  Would like to see test results over time.
Review.Contenu: Interesting....  Not super confident company will ship and the life span of the units.  For example, what if the unit is not used for a while.  Will the unit loose its ability to charge?

Review.Titre: I'm being forced to leave a review…
Review.Contenu: I'm being forced to leave a review before I'm even allowed to see the "Free" offer. They want 5 stars for something I haven't even seen.

Review.Titre: The info-mercial dragged on and did get…
Review.Contenu: The info-mercial dragged on and didn't get right to it. Suggestion, people's time is worth something; the less of it you waste, the more of it they'll share.
Presentation is good, but without physically trying out the product it's too difficult to give an honest opinion of any real business value. Good luck in any event.
I’m very suspicious when it comes to ads, I’ve already sent an Email to them and they responded like a bot. Please, stay away from ads that are too good to be true.

Review.Titre: Have to review BEFORE you buy?
Review.Contenu: I may be jumping the gun here, and maybe the page just isn't loading or something.  I was extremely impressed with the demo video just now, and I was going to do the buy 3 get the extreme for free so I scrolled to the bottom and clicked the link.  The page then took me to a page where the only option was to rate the product that I haven't even purchased yet, and that raises all sorts of red flags.  It seems as if I'm being held is some sort of internet limbo until I write a review to be taken to the next page where I can THEN select the three Magfast units in order to get the extreme for free.  If this is all wrong and I've somehow gone off path I apologize, but as of right this very second it seems like a shady business practice.  If I turn out to be wrong I will try my hardest to change the review, but for now the impression has tanked since the initial video.

Review.Titre: This is probably more of a question
Review.Contenu: I am sure this is probably a great, revolutionary device, but I still do not understand this whole thing.  I am a bit technology challenged.  Yes, I have a desktop, laptop, and an android phone,  It seems like I am always learning, so I am not sure I can call myself savvy.  I expected I was going to see something (obviously that had a cord to charge) that I could lay my phone on and it would charge without attaching a cord.  Instead I see all of this with multiple units, all these charging ports that the space station can attach to, power-banks to carry with me, costing hundreds of dollars, and I spent an hour listening to a presentation that I still don't understand.  Will it still charge my phone without me attaching a cord to my phone????  I think this is all geared to more tech savvy, on the go, younger generation.  I am not sure what I would do with it.

Review.Titre: I was supposed to receive the USB…
Review.Contenu: I was supposed to receive the USB adapter.
The vision is promising. But why only focused on phones? And I understand you’re trying to be the Apple of charging, but the chargers are a bit expensive, no?

Review.Titre: Eco Friendly Wireless Free of all All…
Review.Contenu: Eco Friendly Wireless Free of all All the Hassle this mags my beuatiful fragile grandmothers condition so much easier. MAGFAST ALL THE WAY.
Company requesting 5-star rating prior to customer receiving product; Once product received, will update rating based on experience within 1-month.

Review.Titre: More info and transparency are desirable
Review.Contenu: It would have been desirable to be clear about the time investment and the offer.I added the Tweet and don't see the additional offer promised.
its a brand new idea not many options but could become something big one year or another so think it of as an investment not a purchase

Review.Titre: Your asking for a review when I have…
Review.Contenu: Your asking for a review when I have nothing to review 9. But I gave money think you give person chance use product hell if get it

While this family of products looks Amazing I have some serious concerns about investing now.  Not once in your presentation did you address when these product would be available to ship.  A little research shows that you have been operating and crowd funding since at least 2019 and have yet to ship any product to those customers. I have to wonder what kind of back log you have created!?  Am I being asked to get in line for something I may never received, or that will likely be obsolete when I do finally receive it? One observation that supports this concern - I noticed your Magfast Extreme “in” port is a Micro-USB which is no longer the standard.  I would expect this to be upgraded to a USB-C port.  For a charging station that holds that much power, I can only assume that would take a massive amount of time to reach a full charge on a micro-USB. I would love to be a customer if this is a real product in development.  For now I will wait until I see them actually shipping or available on store shelves.

Review.Titre: The products are fantastic, but watch out for shipping dates
Review.Contenu: The products are fantastic, and the engineering is amazing.  I got in very early on and still after 3 years have not received any "Hello" boxes.  Their website tells me I was in batch #24 to receive my "Hello" boxes, and they are on batch #27 now, but yet I have not received anything and can't seem to get customerservice to give me a direct answer, even though I have emailed them several times.

Review.Titre: Superior quality Magfast Lux charging cable
Review.Contenu: I bought 5 Magfast Lux USB-C to Lightning Cables and includes 2 items (“Limited Edition Lux USB-C Cable in Persian Red” and “Magfast powerbrick 65 PD charger”). All the six cables are received within 2 to 3 weeks. I believe the powerbrick will come when the product is ready. The question is when the powerbrick product will ready? It’s good idea if the Magfast management give us an update otherwise we are in the dark and not sure the item will come or not.The cables have high quality, not easy tangled up and feel milky smooth. The cables are coming with USB-A adapters and silicon wrap to tie the cable.I love this extremely durable and high quality Magfast Lux cables.

Review.Titre: Superior quality Magfast Lux charging cable
Review.Contenu: I bought 5 Magfast Lux USB-C to Lightning Cables and include 2 free items (“Limited Edition Lux USB-C Cable in Persian Red” and “Magfast Powerbrick 65 PD charger”). All the six cables are received within 2 to 3 weeks. I believe the powerbrick will come when the product is ready. The question is when the powerbrick product will ready? It’s good idea if the Magfast management give us an update otherwise we are in the dark and not sure the item will come or not. The cables have high quality, not easy tangled up and feel milky smooth. The cables are coming with USB-A adapters and silicon wrap to tie the cable.I love this extremely durable and high quality Magfast Lux cables.

It took a while but when the products arrived I’ve been very happy using them. The build is good although there are a few unrefined edges sometimes and it would be nice if a iPhone 14 could charge properly even with the camera buldging out a bit. The LUX cable is fantastic though.

Replacement of a defective product was done without question. Response took several weeks, could have sent the required form to me much sooner. Not unhappy, just making constructive advice. Thanks Jeff

Review.Titre: more progress updates requested. Love my MagFast!
Review.Contenu: Love my Magfast Lux cables, so does the family.  I would like to see more progress via website or login as to the progress of the remaining charging products for those that invested in the full kit as well as the Heathrow luggage. I would also like to see a travel case for the extreme that can also hold the jumper cables. The bag is nice for the jumper cables but it it does not hold the extreme. I really do not like the idea of tossing this in the back of the car to get damaged so a zip-up case would be great.

Review.Titre: Chargers look great and preform well
Review.Contenu: Chargers look great and preform well.  However, I'm a little disappointed with the speed of the Qi charging for Air, Life and Extreme.  When charging with a cable, all is fine.  Customer Service is great - they are polite, professional and most importantly prompt.
Love the product and its lifetime warranty. Customer support has been slow but eventually provided a satisfactory response. I do recommend MAGFAST!
The products that I have So that's to use. or great. I would just like to get The products that shirt were best with now, which are the bricks.Still waiting on the original order.

Magfast sets high standards for their products. They work well and look great doing it. If I would change anything it would be the micro USB input for power to charge either battery including extreme seems lacking when USB C is available and would be much faster to recharge, an obvious shortcoming to me. I otherwise like the product overall with it's magnetic connections being a favorite. The "wall" outlet we are still waiting to be produced will also have the magnetic connections. If we can receive the product it will be a welcome part of the family we are now missing.

I pre-ordered my pro kit from this site in 2020. The hello kit was exciting to finally receive and since I have I keep it on my office desk every day. I’ve already received two comments from coworkers talking about how cool the technology is. If you’re not patient, I would recommend waiting to order the magfast products until they have caught up with their pre-orders on the entire line up. That said, the quality exceeded my expectations and the unboxing experience was just fantastic! For me, it was definitely worth the wait, I’m excited to receive the rest of my pre-order at a future date. But for now, I’ve got three great quality chargers that are not just functional, but also aesthetically pleasing.

A few things I wish were different, iPhone 14 has trouble charging on the charging pad because of the camera extruding from the phone thus not allowing a good connection on the pad. Other than that though these are great. I’m very happy with them.

Review.Titre: I am very impressed by Magfast
Review.Contenu: I am very impressed by Magfast, the Team and the products. I really would have liked to give 5 stars, however to date I have only received one of the three products ordered through Magfast directly, and have yet to receive any of the chargers that I backed and paid for on Kickstarter. Once all products have been received I will gladly give 5 stars

I'm grateful that it finally arrived two years later. But I'm also a bit disappointed that I didn't get the color I wanted, because I wouldn't say I like the color, White. Also, the Air though it has a unique and convenient design, is extremely slow compared to an official Apple rapid charger.

The experience I liked was the layout of the website and how you choose the product you want. The checkout process was easy and everything went great on that end. The part of waiting for the item to ship was a little long as it took about a month to ship only after I reached out to customer service which is why I couldn't give the full five star ( I know its a startup and there is room to improve). On to the product- it is amazing to be honest such amazing quality and well worth the price I admire the small touches too ,putting a adapter for USB type A since most places haven't adapted USB Type C along with the strap that comes with it so when rolled up it stays that way. If the shipping can get to amazon fast or close to it this would be my go to shop for buying my cords and power supplies for my products

Review.Titre: Have not received all that I ordered
Review.Contenu: It is hard to give a total review when all my order hasn't been sent. The items that I have received are all of excellent quality. I do find it hard to charge my older devices that do not work with magfast. I am looking to the future as all the things that I acquire will be able to use magfast chargers. that will take awhile though because it all takes money to update all the devices that I own. thank you for such great quality.
Happy to report that you stood by your lifetime guarantee but regret that it took a few rounds of questioning.Thx

Review.Titre: I like the cables but not customer support
Review.Contenu: I like the cables.  They are fantastic.  I did contact customer service over a month ago because the adapters (lightening to a)(c to a) have broken.   I sent pictures when requested but have not been responded to in a sensible way.  I participated in crowd funding for this company.  Understand the delay in that product.   But please replace the broken pieces so I can use lux again.
Very informative and ground breaking tech

As a Magfast investor, I was REALLY excited to receive my pre-ordered products, and I’m sorry to say two things have taken a lot of that thrill away: 1. Delivery of individual products has taken FAR TOO LONG (as I’m still awaiting a few to arrive), and 2. The Extreme has failed to function properly and requires a replacement. When the products do arrive in their entirety, I’ll be better prepared to make a fair and accurate assessment…

I have been onboard with Magfast for more than three years. They deliver great products, mostly related to the "charging" industry. And, they stand behind them. I have found each of the products I have purchased, that they have delivered, to be of highest quality, lovely to behold, and able to do the job for which they were created to an extremely high level.The only reason I have not given a full-blown 5-star rating is because there are still a couple of products that I have prepaid for that are taking a long time to manufacture and ship. The products that have been manufactured and shipped, however, are totally 5-star!!

I placed a preorder back in July of 2020.  There used to be updates that happened weekly but haven't seen any in a while.  After reading the reviews, it sounded like new orders were receiving their extreme and other chargers before pre-orders which upsets me.  The customer service when I have contacted them has been very informative and quick to respond.  I am still looking forward to receiving my products but worried about the lack of updates in their website and status page.  Scheduled for batch 23 delivery which was supposed to deliver April 21-30 and has been delayed with no updates.

Megfast has very promising products, i ordered the charging cable and they are a great, smooth and durable. this is an honest review, this is the reason its not a 5 star review. i watched the presentation ( which i thought was great) and I was ready to purchase the entire system, but during checkout a disclaimer read, something like this is a start up company and you may not receive all the ordered products. The disclaimer impacted my decision to purchase.

Well the only reason they got a 4 in the first place is because I really like the charge cords LUX they are great but I ordered a bunch other stuff months ago and have yet to see a hint of it being sent to me. I do wish that they would get their manufacturing problem repaired.

Review.Titre: My Lux order came on time and the…
Review.Contenu: My Lux order came on time and the product is lovely.  All my family were pleased with their Christmas gift.  There was a little confusion about the usb A adapter but we figured it out.  Looking forward to my shipment in April!  When I inquired about the shipment time in October, Kate quickly replied and gave me the information I needed.

A dream come. To have such a unique system that does what you need and when.  Then to know that it does what you want Thanks for the experience and the great deal of an offer. Hope to enjoy and be a part of your inventions future.  Sincerely, David Iglesias, a retired pastor with the Church of the Nazarene.

Review.Titre: I love your product but don’t like how…
Review.Contenu: I really love your products but don’t like how products are put in my shopping cart, I know how to choose the products I prefer. Thank you

Review.Titre: Long wait but hopefully the experience will be worth it.
Review.Contenu: So I placed my pre-order back in 2019 on Kickstarter or a similar site. I was told my batch number was 22 back in July 2022. Now after cleaning out my email, I'm reminded of the  $300 CAD preorder I made back in 2019 which I found out today is delayed. Edit: I've been contacted and things seem to be moving fwd. And it appears I have the first part of my order on the way. 4 stars due to more than adequate customer service and a quick response too my concern.

Magfast always impressed me with their honesty and integrity when passing on information. With them supplying a new technology item it takes time and persistence to get it right and they are using that to get it right the first time. They are exceptional at keeping us informed as to the status of things. Finally got my shipping batch number so I have an idea when to expect delivery. It is ,however, taking a long time to ship finished product and that’s why only 4 out of 5 stars. I have no doubt about their integrity and support what they are doing.

MAGFAST caught my attention because I love high quality, cutting edge products. First the family of chargers, then Lux, their cables and finally Heathrow luxury luggage. This company has a strong sales approach and is very honest about their past. They are great at marketing and stream live to provide news and information about their products. Can’t wait to get my chargers and my luggage. The one area I believe they can improve on is promising delivery time frames. They provided some for the chargers but did not follow through and deliver on it. I’m still waiting for an estimated delivery date for my Family Pro Kit batch number….. My Lux charging cables are top notch and I love them and I’m confident that the chargers and luggage will be as well.

Review.Titre: I ordered $600 of products 2 years ago…
Review.Contenu: I ordered $600 of products 2 years ago and just today received my hello kit. The chargers received are EXTREME, LIFE, and AIR. I also received a USB-C to Lightning mini cable and a USB-C to Micro-USB mini cable, and the car Jumper cables.Holding these beautiful chargers in my hands is fantastic. They just feel like quality. The fact that each charger works magnetically with every other charger is amazing. I had previously given a 1 rating because I just didn’t believe that Magfast was legitimate. I have changed my review to a 4. I wish there were 2 categories. I would give the products a 5+ but the shipping a 2 - 3. I understand that the global parts availability was a big factor along with the pandemic interference which I understand is beyond the control of Magfast. Still though, slow turnaround is slow turnaround.Final thought: It is impossible to purchase a better quality product! 😊

I've been working with the great folks at MagFast for several years.  Yes, they're experiencing some 'growing pains' and the fact that I ordered just before the beginning of the Covid Plandemic didn't help, but I have complete faith that they're doing their best to provide trend setting products that will be the highest quality available.  Seymour and Kate have been very responsive and helpful and always respond to my queries.
Customer service was great because I have got my order lost and it was replaced to me. Their response time can be sometimes slow but they do reply to you eventually.
the product itself is wonderful and has lasted with few problems - The cord itself gets a little bent out of shape easily.

Review.Titre: I have always had a great experience…
Review.Contenu: I have always had a great experience with Magfast. Customer service has been very friendly and helpful. I'm still patiently waiting for my preorder and am very excited for it to become a reality and in my hands. The company is very good with all the information on the products. It's been a journey that I have enjoyed following.

The cables are great, however the red cables that were given as a premium are very hard to read the serial number on the cable, and I question if anyone who finds my cable if they can read the information well enough to be able to notify me of the found cable.  The white cables are very clear, just the red cables are very hard to read.

My experience with this company and their products has been phenomenal! The products are amazing and the customer service is as well. I had a product break, not the manufacturers fault, and they still sent me a new one!

Pro: Amazing products that execell expectations from what I have received. so far they work with all my devices and even things that I had for years is compatible! They package with care and have clear instructions on how to use. Con: I cannot submit the devices that I received to thier protection site like no matter how I put the "finger print " in it will not accept it also I still have been waiting on my additional orders for quite some time with no additional updates. I had ordered the green version of the devices and the other parts of my pro kit but I have only received the hello kit and a cable I ordered so far. I do trust that the company will eventually send them but the length of the wait and the wait for an update deducts a star.

THE MAGFAST VIDEO, VERY INFORMANT,  EXCELLENT "PROFESSOR " SEYMOUR THE INVENTOR. ANY QUESTIONS ASKED WERE ANSWERED DURING THE VIDEO. EASY TO UNDERSTAND FAST DELIVERY,  RECEIVED MUCH BETTER THAN I EVER THOUGHT IT WOULD BE. MAGFAST LUX CABLE IS THE GREATEST!

The concepts and innovation provided by this company are amazing.  The only thing that is not so appealing is the idea of the prices on some of the devices. May be something to reconsider slightly. Making cases/covers for the devices, specifically for the more portable daily devices, would be great!

I have communicated approximately 5 times with Magfast via email when I have not received an answer back. I am very frustrated. My Lux cables received are as wonderful as described. 817-404-7207 Rachel Neff

Great products, the only thing that could improve them is if they were made in the United States. Their customer service could also be better, I should not have to wait a week for a response each time I send an email!

Being completely honest, I haven’t exactly been very happy with my overall experience thus far. It’s been years since fulfillment was supposed to have happened. They did keep communicating with me, telling of improvements they’d been making, and even had me verify my mailing address for shipping this April. Even though I’d not received anything from them at the time, I invested further, and received some products from them, which are quite exceptional, and I’m quite impressed. I’m very much looking forward to fulfillment next month, and I really hope they get production rolling to the point that they can really get their products out there.

Review.Titre: Was really looking forward to getting the product until...
Review.Contenu: Well thought out and comprehensive presentation, but was very disappointed when the box said that the product is made in china. Additionally, the promised USB A adapter was not included, and had to be requested separately. Thank you for your quick response to my concern, and I realize that too many things are made overseas nowadays, but it's just disappointing still that's so much is. And, it sounded like this was a US company that was making these products. The quality is good and I'm looking forward to getting the adapter that I signed up for, but it's still disappointing to me that so much is made in china. That's going to hurt this country in the long run.

I like the cable, they say you get a free type a adapter but show you no way to get it. Also, the little cord minder they sent ripped the minute I tried to wrap it around the cord. Other than that I like the cord so far

Review.Titre: The products they make a first class
Review.Contenu: The products they make a first class. I have bought many and have gifted them to family who also love them. They had a difficult time with manufacturing and distribution but now have it all in order. Very well done overall for a startup operation.

Review.Titre: Products are very high quality and…Quality products
Review.Contenu: Products are very high quality and probably the best on the market today. Wish the wall unit would arrive soon so I could put all the products together and really get the full advantage.

Review.Titre: Updated Review--Hard to Order Just the Free One they Offer for Listening to Their Sales Pitch
Review.Contenu: This is an update to my original review.  I received the cable today, less than a week after I listened to their webinar, and i was pleased that it arrived so quickly.  And the cable seems to be very nice.  It is much more flexible than most other cables, and it works just fine.  I am changing my original rating from a 3 to a 4. I would have made it a "5" but I took one star off because it was difficult to order the "free" cable after listening to their webinar.

The only thing i would improve on is the color options and the adapters to be a bit stronger so they wont get lost easily or maybe make a keychain box to hold them or a magnetic holder. Ive already lost one of my adapters

Review.Titre: I received my magfast lux charger cord…
Review.Contenu: I received my magfast lux charger cord today and I absolutely love it! It's so smooth and the perfect length.  I wish I knew about thos sooner.  I'm going to share with everyone I know.  Super happy with this lux charger.
The only thing is that, I am STILL WAITING for my stuff. I am referring to my magfast LIFE and my magfast AIR items.
Great co., great marketing, nice sleek cable. Expected 'rapid charging' but not my experience. Still waiting on order for chargers since 6/2018

I first had contact with Magfast in May, 2018 when I placed 3 Pre-Orders #D180517-11605 ; #D180518-85035 and #D180518-20697. To this date (5years later), I still have not received those orders which have been paid for.Today, I received my order MS10023917, of  Lux cables only to find that 1(one) item was missing from the shipment.Based on their advertising, MAGFAST produces superior products, but their attention to fulfilling placed orders appears to lacking. Customer Service has provided a number of reasons as to why my pre-orders have not been sent, but, really, 5 years is stretching it a bit. As for the cables, I have just contacted their customer service and I am awaiting a reply.I have been contacted by Magfast's Customer Service and have been given detailed reasons for the delay in my pre-orders. I was even offered a refund.I found their explanation plausible and have decided to stay with them until the end. They deserve another chance.

Review.Titre: September 29, 2018 - the date I placed my initial order with MAGFAST
Review.Contenu: I placed my initial order with Magfast on September 29, 2018 and I, like many others, am just about to receive my order in the next month or so. That's 4 and a half years of waiting !!Was I frustrated ... a little! Did my patience wear a bit thin .... quite often! Am I still anxious and excited to be receiving my orders shortly .... you betcha!!!The weekly updates from Kate and Seymore were awesome and helped me keep the faith!!This certainly was Mission MAGpossible!!!!

Review.Titre: Great product looks and feels great.
Review.Contenu: Great product looks and feels great.. love the gold plating and not having to worry about it breaking right at the end by the usbc and have to wrap it around ur phone or do other stuff to get it to work.. and if it does end up doin that u guys put a lifetime warranty on it to boot.. great job guys

So far seems good. Haven't used because I don't have an adapter yet. I thought the video i watched said it came with an adapter but it did not. It did come with a card saying I could get an adapter for it. So I can't use until I get the adapter. I don't wanna plug it into any other adapter. Indont know what the point is sending cord without adapter, now I gotta wait another week or 2 before I can use the charge cord. Edit to reply, I understand it's a bonus and in the video seminar I attended it showed an adapter in the box with charge cord. I didn't receive one in my box

This is my first time attending this type of event and making such an expensive purchase (CAD conversion always hurts). I had a need for this product and it seemed like a worthwhile purchase. The presentation was clear and informative and did a good job of showing the product, basic use and accesories that come with each item. My only issue is that if you have important pre purchase questions, they aren't able to answer them during the webinar and as there's a 30 min timer to purchase at the special price, I had to act or lose out. In fact, although %90 of my questions were answered during the course of the presentation; my two most important questions were not and the host ended by saying that was all the questions they had. I'm going to try reaching out now but it would have been nice to know before the final purchase.

I was very excited to get my bonus Lux cables. The reason I couldn't give it 5 stars is because of the difficulty getting thru the packaging to get to the cable. I had to use a table knife to open the box, and scissors to free the cable from the holders keeping it in place. Otherwise, everything is a beautiful and luxurious to look at and to touch as Seymour has always said it would be.Oh, and they came a day early! Woohoo!
The customer service department does a great job.Ask a question or voice a concern and they respond in a timely manner.

Review.Titre: It was really easy to place my order…
Review.Contenu: It was really easy to place my order and checkout. Shipping was quick even though it took five days for them to ship it after I received the tracking number. Love the products. Customer service is great.

Review.Titre: They are shipping cables as Ordered and…
Review.Contenu: They are shipping cables as Ordered and working on getting the charging magfast out ASAP. They have kept me informed and updated as to order status.

Review.Titre: After 3 years of waiting for this…
Review.Contenu: After 3 years of waiting for this product to be developed, it finally arrived. First I received LUX cables. They are great. Just as advertised. I purchased 4 for $99 through Indiegogo. Next I received the first installment of the Magfast pro package. It contained the Extreme and Life. Extreme works great just as promised although I have yet had a chance to jump start a car. The Life works great with cable charging but tends to overheat with Chi charging. I can not charge a Samsung S21 cellphone completely one time via Chi without seeing flashing red lights which mean it is overheating and it shuts down. Charging the same phone via cable works just fine.

Review.Titre: The cable is nice quality and "feels…
Review.Contenu: The cable is nice quality and "feels nice". Well made. But almost $50 shipped for a charging cable? If you have a $200,000 Porsche and $1,000 Beluga Caviar, $50 may not be much for a cable. But for most of us in this economy it's much too pricey. Still if money is no object - great cable!

Yes, the LUX is pretty, silky, doesn’t  kink and appears to be well made but it doesn’t charge any faster than the cable that came with my iPhone.  I care more about functionality than cosmetics. They are pricey.  What I like best is the 6 ft. length.  I did receive the LUX faster than I thought I would and it was packaged well.

After a very long wait, after ordering via the crowd funding phase, after investing and following the weekly reports I’m more than pleased to say that my skepticism will NOT be rewarded. My delivery is no longer a date in the future. I should be in actual possession of MAGFAST product within days. And I’m looking forward to being able to then report that it was worth the wait.
It's feels and looks like a high quality usb c cable but it does not support super fast charging 2.0 on newer galaxy devices.

Product seems very nice. Not stiff so it's easy to store away. Phone charge time looks to be the same as when using my older cable. Wish it came in a dark color, like black.  Expensive, but might be more durable. Time will tell.

Well.  This is hard to write.  The company has perhaps the best customer service in the biz. The problem has been the wait and the uncertainty about when and if you will get the product.  I wish them the best and will be happy when I get everything I paid for.
Easy to work with.  Took several days for a response but very cordial and helpful.

Review.Titre: I was disappointed that Air had to be…
Review.Contenu: I was disappointed that Air had to be plugged in to charge my phone. My mistake it was not designed to hold a charge.

Review.Titre: I know I'll love this cable BUT
Review.Contenu: I know I'll love this cable BUT, My only issue is that the online video event said all charge cables come with an adapter for USB A but they don't say the adapter comes after your cable arrives. So I cant use now until adapter comes. Which to me seems pointless. I was so excited to use my new cable and then order more. I Have a 4 person home with 5 rooms that need new charging capabilities. But now I gotta wait another 2 weeks before I get to try it out. Just doesn't make sense EDIT: Even though I think sending the USB A adapter after the charge cord is kinda ridiculous, because you can't use the cord until you get adapter. Anyway the adapter came very fast as soon as I registered the charge cord. And I am impressed with the cord. It charges faster then the cord my phone came with. Also my laptop did not tell me I was charging slow. Also the feel of the cord I can tell how well this is made. If it last longer then a couple of months (that's how long most cords last after my kids use them), then I'll definitely be recommending and buying more products.

I'm anxious to see a product after 3 years but so far they have kept their word on better not quick production.  I'll stay loyal as long as I see progress and so far they haven't disappointed.

Review.Titre: Helped start a vehicle with a dead battery - no effort
Review.Contenu: After almost a year to the day I received it, I finally got to use my Magfast Extreme to help start a vehicle that had a flat battery.  A visitor at the hospital in which I work came to my office requesting assistance with starting his minivan that had a flat battery.  One of my officers took out the large booster box we have and came back twenty minutes later, admitting defeat and complaining the booster was toast and not fit for the purpose - this was the first I became aware of todays situation.Having added my Magfast Extreme to my daily kit for work, took the booster cables which I keep in in my own truck and went out to the broken down minivan.  I was able to quickly connect the leads to the Extreme and then to the vehicles dead battery.  Switched on the Extreme and let it sit for a few seconds.  The visitor switched on his vehicle ignition and hey presto, the minivan started, first time.  The vehicle owner was very impressed and I was happy to have helped him get on his way after a traumatic day at the hospital.Extreme functioned seamlessly and impressed not only the vehicle user but one of my officers that came out to watch.  He's now investigating the options for buying one for himself.
Great service and without a doubt the best made cable on the market with a warranty that ensures that you have a quality product for years to come

My brother even asked me where I got the cord from and wants one too. The price may be a little high but it's worth it for the quality and lifetime warranty. Can't wait till I get the other stuff I ordered I would definitely recommend magfast to anyone looking for great quality cables.

They explained that we would receive our orders in the order they were placed and it would be quite some time before they would be shipped. Delays in parts have pushed them farther behind. Review.Titre: I received my chargers last month about…
Review.Contenu: I received my chargers last month about mid-October, after a very long wait time. But that is to be expected because at the time this is a brand-new product going through testing and development, in all the phases and stages before bringing a quality product to market. I opened the shipping box two weeks ago to discover the products shipped, as there will be a part two. Thus far I am delighted with the LIFE and AIR which I am using right now to charge my iPhone 13 Pro. My extreme power bank came with two of the 10 LEDs lit up so it’s at low charge and I’m charging it now even nearly 10 hours later it is still charging but then again this is the largest and most powerful of the MAGFAST chargers which is alleged to be able to re-charge a car’s battery.I have confidence in the company because I have frequently received emails updating me as to the progress and addressing delays, of which there have been many yet, again this is to be expected and the product comes in quality packaging and appears to be very solid and well functioning.  Nay sayers be quiet and be patient.  If it’s taking too long, you can opt for a return of your funds by cancelling your order.   I did not take that option because I recognised that this was a good deal, even if it took three years to receive it.

Review.Titre: This is how an honest review looks.
Review.Contenu: Hi there world of tech. Just wanted to throw down some words about an experience I had with one of the products I had purchased from the company with the name of Magfast. I figure most points of contact would like to know how their performance was in resolving an issue that a customer has had with their product I know I do, so here it goes. I have purchased 2 of the pro kits from the company and must say I love them, hence 2 kits not just one. But that's not where my issue developed. I purchased one of the Lux charging cords to go with them. The item charged my phone faster than any previous cords I have used. I was a happy man. After about three months or so and many hours of charging while using, I suddenly hear my phone go per-ding, like I had just plugged it into the charger. Wait WHAT it's already plugged in so why is it per-dinging? I brush it off and continue trying to see how fast I can get my Amazon order here. Then again per-ding, oh Hell no my phone's charging port better not be going out. So while I'm on Amazon I might as well order a 90 degree charging extension cord plug, hoping to relieve the stressed port. The item arrived the next morning between 4am-8am Thank You Amazon. But No change in the issue. Now Magfast has a 25,000 bends test and by no means have I exceeded that. Out comes the continuity checker and bingo, it's shorting out. Customer service time, I contact the company about the isolated incident and after answering a few questions a new cord arrived at my doorstep almost as fast as Amazons package did. Once again a happy man emerges from the phone charging depths of the unknown. Thank You Magfast for the rather fast response resolving the issue. The moral off the story and only con about the whole experience, MAGFAST PLEASE!!! PLEASE!!!! produce a 90 degree adaptor for your LUX PREMIUM charging cords. And to all of the interested that let me bend your ear for that long I would like to take a moment to Thank you all for taking the time out of your busy schedule to read about my experience, I appreciate you all.Spread the LovePeace OutArt "Like On The Wall"
